questions.question: What are the tags and attributes in HTML?
questions.details: Tags are the primary component of the HTML that defines how the content will be structured/ formatted, whereas Attributes are used along with the HTML tags to define the characteristics of the element.
questions.shortAns: It is a primary component of the HTML

questions.question: What is HTML layout structure?
questions.details: Every web page has different components to display the intended content and a specific UI. But still, there are few things which are templated and are globally accepted way to structure the web page, such as: <header>
questions.shortAns: It is a web page that has different components to display.

questions.question: What is the advantage of collapsing white space in HTML 5 ?
questions.details: In HTML, a blank sequence of whitespace characters is treated as a single space character, Because the browser collapses multiple spaces into a single space character and this helps a developer to indent lines of text without worrying about multiple spaces and maintain readability and understandability of HTML codes.
questions.shortAns: It increases readability and understandability of HTML codes.
